div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 744 Adrianople (now Edirne) environs, (15) Thrace, before 1780 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Thracian Chersonese: hemidr. Disposition: formerly Ainslie coll. (some) Sestini, Lettere ... Ainslieana (Leghorn, 1789) 1, p. 130, note
